Class COM.sootNsmoke.instructions.Invoke 

java.lang.Object

           +----COM.sootNsmoke.instructions.Invoke
public abstract class Invoke
extends Sequence
The base class for the Invoke{Virtual,Special,Static} Call the function f with signature sig in class c, with n arguments, using opcode (which should be opc_invokevirtual, opc_invokespecial, or opc_invokestatic Suggestion: compute n from the signature.

Invoke(String, String, String, int, int)

countArgs(String)
Counts the number of arguments inside a method signature
sizeOf(String)
Returns the number of slots taken up by an element with type descriptor desc.
toBytecodes(Bytecodes)
Converts the instruction sequence to an array of bytecodes.

sizeOf 
 public static int sizeOf(String desc)
Returns the number of slots taken up by an element with type descriptor desc. J and D return 2, V returns 0, and anything else is 1.

Converts the instruction sequence to an array of bytecodes.
